title: Episode 6: How To Forgive
description:
In this episode, we talk about why forgiveness is for us, not the other person. We also talk about why forgiveness doesn’t excuse someone’s behavior and also doesn’t necessarily mean we allow them in our lives. Like all things, forgiveness is a journey.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012
